Old News

October 2022

I attented AIIDE22 (Pomona, CA, USA), where I presented my recent paper and co-organized EXAG. The talk is available on YouTube.

August 2022

My recent AIIDE22 paper is now available on arXiv.

July 2022

My paper Controlling Perceived Emotion in Symbolic Music Generation with Monte Carlo Tree Search has been accepted to AIIDE22.

May 2022

I am co-organizing the 9th Workshop on Experimental AI in Games (EXAG), which will take place at AIIDE22.

February 2022

I started as a Postdoctoral Fellow at Amii - University of Alberta.

October 2021

The manuscript and presentation of my Ph.D. dissertation are now available to the public.

August 2021

I successfully defended my Ph.D. dissertation: Controlling Neural Language Models for Affective Music Composition.
